special_trout_water_stream.info: From fish migration barrier located about 0.2 miles upstream of NM Road 70 to its headwaters
special_trout_water_stream.pro_regulation: Catch-and-release (Native), unlimited (NN), artificial fly or lure with single barbless hook
special_trout_water_stream.trout_present: Rio Grande cutthroat trout, brown trout

special_trout_water_stream.info: From Valles Caldera Preserve boundary downstream 2 miles
special_trout_water_stream.pro_regulation: 2 trout any length, artificial fly or lure with single barbless hook

special_trout_water_stream.info: From waterfall barrier at Black Canyon campground upstream.  Open July 1-Oct 31.
special_trout_water_stream.pro_regulation: Catch-and-release (Native), unlimited (NN), artificial fly or lure with single barbless hook

special_trout_water_lake.info: Valle Vidal, small pond located directly south of larger upper pond is designated for anglers 11 years old and younger
special_trout_water_lake.tackle_regulation: Artificial fly or lure, single barbless hood
special_trout_water_lake.pro_regulation: 2 fish any length, artificial fly or lure with single barbless hook

special_trout_water_stream.info: From USFS Road 93 crossing upstream to its headwaters
special_trout_water_stream.pro_regulation: Catch-and-release (Native), unlimited (NN), artificial fly or lure with single barbless hook
special_trout_water_stream.trout_present: Rio Grande cutthroat trout, brown trout

special_trout_water_stream.info: Catwalk National Recreational Trail parking area upstream to headwaters including all tribs
special_trout_water_stream.pro_regulation: 2 trout any length, any legal bait and tackle

special_trout_water_stream.info: From USFS Roads 284 & 87A , 2.5 miles upstream to the private land boundary
special_trout_water_stream.pro_regulation: 2 trout any length, artificial fly or lure with single barbless hook

special_trout_water_stream.info: Within the Valle Vidal boundary.  Open July 1-Dec 31
special_trout_water_stream.pro_regulation: Catch-and-release (Native), unlimited (NN), artificial fly or lure with single barbless hook
special_trout_water_stream.trout_present: Rio Grande cutthroat trout, brook trout

special_trout_water_stream.pro_regulation: Catch-and-release only, artificial fly or lure with single barbless hook

special_trout_water_stream.info: From its confluence with Latir Creek upstream 2.4 miles to the Valle Viday boundary
special_trout_water_stream.pro_regulation: Catch-and-release only, artificial fly or lure with single barbless hook
special_trout_water_stream.trout_present: Rio Grande cutthroat trout, brook trout, brown trout

special_trout_water_stream.info: From Fridenbloom Drive upstream to teh Mescalero Reservation
special_trout_water_stream.pro_regulation: 2 trout any length, any legal bait and tackle

special_trout_water_stream.info: From Deer Creek Landing upstream 6.0 miles to Stable Canyon
special_trout_water_stream.pro_regulation: 2 trout any length, artificial fly or lure with single barbless hook
special_trout_water_stream.trout_present: Rio Grande cutthroat trout, brown trout

special_trout_water_stream.info: From Navajo Dam downstream 3.75 miles to the Crusher Hole Day Use Area.  It is illegal to fish with more than 2 flies on a single line.
special_trout_water_stream.pro_regulation: Catch-and-release only, artificial fly or lure with single barbless hook

special_trout_water_stream.info: From east end of Tolby Campground downstream 1.4 miles to first US 64 bridge
special_trout_water_stream.pro_regulation: Catch-and-release only, artificial fly or lure with single barbless hook
